verses.verse: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of YHVH: because many false prophets are gone out into the world.
Hereby know ye the Spirit of YHVH: Every spirit that confesseth that Yeshua the Messiah is come in the flesh is of YHVH:

And every spirit that confesseth not that Yeshua the Messiah is come in the flesh is not of YHVH: and this is that spirit of antimessiah, whereof ye have heard that it should come; and even now already is it in the world.
Ye are of YHVH, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.
They are of the world: therefore speak they of the world, and the world heareth them.
We are of YHVH: he that knoweth YHVH heareth us; he that is not of YHVH heareth not us. Hereby know we the spirit of truth, and the spirit of error.
Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of YHVH; and every one that loveth is born of YHVH, and knoweth YHVH.
He that loveth not knoweth not YHVH; for YHVH is love.
In this was manifested the love of YHVH toward us, because that YHVH sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him.
Herein is love, not that we loved YHVH, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
Beloved, if YHVH so loved us, we ought also to love one another.
No man hath seen YHVH at any time. If we love one another, YHVH dwelleth in us, and his love is perfected in us.
Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.
And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world.
Whosoever shall confess that Yeshua is the Son of YHVH, YHVH dwelleth in him, and he in YHVH.
And we have known and believed the love that YHVH hath to us. YHVH is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in YHVH, and YHVH in him.
Herein is our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world.
There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.
We love him, because he first loved us.
If a man say, I love YHVH, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, how can he love YHVH whom he hath not seen?
And this commandment have we from him, That he who loveth YHVH love his brother also.
